name: GiardiasisTestsForGiardiaSpeciesNucleicAcid
title: Giardiasis (Tests for Giardia species Nucleic Acid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting Giardia nucleic acid),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: Giardia probe/non-probe),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
